shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 5ra-80vb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymns (fols. 5ra-8va) I-2) Introductory exhortation (fols. 8va-9vb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... "I worship Thee..." (fols. 9vb-10va) I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 91 miracles (fols. 10va-80vb)

copyists.copyist: Gäbrä ʾAmlak is mentioned as the scribe in a supplication on fol. 36rb and in the concluding supplication on fol. 80va-vb.

donors.donor: The following persons are mentioned in the supplication formulas until fol. 24ra, in a secondary hand (strong red): Gäbrä Giyorgis, ʾAmätä ʾIyäsus, Wäldä Maryam and Wälättä Maryam. Sometimes names are added in pen from fol. 25ra onwards, such as: Gäbrä Śǝllase, Wälättä Ṣadǝqan.

txstates.txstate: The sewing in quire I is partly missing and has been repaired. Tear amended on fol. 70.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, double crescent with eye, double sine wave with dots, six pointed cross).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of most of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

inks.ink: Black, red (vivid red and strong red)

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – I(8/fols. 5r-12v) – ፪II(8/fol. 13r-20v) – ፫III(8/fols. 21r-28v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 29r-36v) – ፭V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 37r-44v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 45r-52v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 53r-60v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 61r-68v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 69r-76v) – ፲X(7; s.l.: 5, stub after 2/fols. 77r-83v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling (on fol. 1r below the ruling). The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the scribe; names of the donors (in a secondary hand); groups of lines in the incipit page of Texts I-1; incipit of sections and subsections; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Throughout Text I-4 ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 includes the hymns: - ʾƎsäggǝd läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "I worship Thee, O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fols. 7vb-8ra) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam dǝngǝl ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn ǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour, Mother of the Light ..." (fol. 8ra-va).
All miracles of Mary (Text I-4) are numbered. Miracles 21, 22 and 23 are followed by a poem: - fol. 30rb: ዛካርያስ፡ ርእየ፡ በወርኃ፡ ሳባጥ፡ በሠርቁ። ተአምረኪ፡ ለዘይት፡ ማዕከለ፡ ፪ኤ፡ አዕፁቁ። ማርያም፡ ጽዮን፡ ለብርሃን፡ ተቅዋመ፡ ወርቁ። ዕዝራኒ፡ በገዳም፡ አመ፡ ወዓለ፡ ውዱቁ። ለኅብረ፡ ገጽኪ፡ ጽጌ፡ ሐተወ፡ መብረቁ። (= a strophe from the Maḫletä ṣǝge "Canticle of the Flower", cp. GrohHymn p. 78). - fol. 31ra: ታቦተ፡ አምላከ፡ ፳ኤል፡ ጽዮን፡ ማርያም፡ ዘነገደት፡ ምድረ፡ ኢሎፍሊ። ወቀጥቀጠቶ፡ ለዳጎን፡ ነፍሳተ፡ ብዙሃን፡ ማኅጐሊ። አመ፡ ነገደት፡ ቍስቋም፡ በኃይለ፡ ወልዳ፡ ከሃሊ። ወድቁ፡ አማልክተ፡ ግብፅ፡ መናብርተ፡ ሰይጣን፡ ሀባሊ። ወተኃፍሩ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ {ዘቦሙ፡} አስጋሊ። - fol. 31vb: እስከ፡ መነነቶ፡ ሚልኮል፡ ቅድመ፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ አመ፡ ዘፈነ። ንጉሠ፡ ፳ኤል፡ ኪያኪ፡ ዘጸገየ፡ ስነ። ቅድመ፡ ገጸ፡ ሥዕልኪ፡ እንዘ፡ እዘፍን፡ አነ። ዘይሜንን፡ ተአምረኪ፡ ወሰብሐተኪ፡ ቍርባነ። በአፈ፡ መላእክት፡ ወሰብእ፡ ለይኩን፡ ምኑነ።
Text I-4 concludes with a supplication for the scribe.

extras.extra: - Spaces left for rubricated names were not filled from fol. 25ra onwards; occasionally names are added in pen. - Omitted letters or words are inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 25vb, 31ra, 45vb, 68ra. - Tämälläs-sign, indicating the place where the omitted passage, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 63ra.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the centre of the upper margin on fols.: 13r: ፪, 21r: ፫, 29r: ፬, 37r: ፭, 45r: ፮, 53r: ፯, 61r: ፰, 69r: ፱, 77r: ፲.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in the upper margin, in the main hand: ዘልደታ: fol. 14ra ዘገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱ[ስ]: fol. 19va ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 21va ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት: fol. 25ra አመ፡ ፰ለሰኔ፡ fol. 25va ዘሕንፀተ፡ ቤታ: fol. 26ra ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 29ra ዘኅዳር፡ ጽዮን: fol. 29va ዘአስተርእዮ: fol. 35ra ዘልደት: fol. 40ra ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 45rb ዘኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት: fol. 46va ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 66va ዘመላእክት: fol. 68rb ዘመድኃኒ፡ ዓለም: fol. 69vb ዘቍስቋም: fol. 70rb ዘቅዱስ፡ ጊዮርጊስ: fol. 73ra.
